name: Inventor Desktop Content Library File
summary: An IDCL file is a library file used by Autodesk Inventor, an application utilized to design three-dimensional prototypes. It stores tables of numerical data that represent parts, such as screws, nuts, pins, and bolts that can be inserted into Inventor assemblies ( .IAM files) as parts ( .IPT files) by Inventor users.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
